definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: The lake lies low by the hill, a tearful entreaty of love at the foot of the inflexible.
sentences.chinese: 湖躺在山脚下，像在执拗者的跟前含泪恳求爱。

sentences.english: Foot of the mountain there is a clear bottoming out of the creek, streams next to the terraces.
sentences.chinese: 山脚下有一条清澈见底的小溪，小溪旁边是梯田。

sentences.english: There are no foot hills, no mountains, no plateaus, in any direction.
sentences.chinese: 莫斯科的任何方向上都没有山脚，高山和高原。

sentences.english: Fortunately, we manage to assemble at the foot of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 但可幸我们全部相聚于山脚下。

sentences.english: The road straightens up at the bottom of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 那条路到了山脚就变直了。

sentences.english: The man wearing the cape is the leader, and he wants them to come to the bottom of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 披着斗篷的男人才是领导，他希望她们到山脚下来。

sentences.english: By the time I double-checked my gear and clothing, there were only six people left at the base.
sentences.chinese: 等我再次检查完装备和衣物，山脚下只剩6个人了。

sentences.english: At the foot of the hill lies a beautiful lake.
sentences.chinese: 小山脚下有一个美丽的小湖。

sentences.english: The hospital spread upward from foot to the top of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个从山脚往山顶慢慢走上去的医院。

sentences.english: So you have the gears sorted, but what should you do at the bottom of the hill?
sentences.chinese: 档位问题解决了，但是来到山脚下首先应该做什么呢？

sentences.english: The garden extends as far as the foot of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 花园一直伸展到山脚下。

sentences.english: It took us a week to trek to the foot of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了一星期才跋涉到山脚。

sentences.english: My dream home is ___ ____ ____ ____ a hill.
sentences.chinese: 我的理想的家在一座山脚下。

sentences.english: The Simurgh saw the helpless babe lying at the foot of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 西默夫看见这个孤苦伶仃的婴儿躺在山脚下。

sentences.english: Two battalions assembled foot two-tier stand.
sentences.chinese: 二营为二梯队集结山脚待命。

sentences.english: His own madrona ranch vineyard, located at the base of spring mountain, west of st.
sentences.chinese: 玛铎纳葡萄园位于纳帕春山山脚下，圣爱莲娜以西。

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
Shanshang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
